blocks.name: efgh
blocks.content: The exponential function of a scaled complex number is a group homomorphism from the group of complex numbers under addition to the set of complex numbers under multiplication. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Apr-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-May-2014.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm efgh(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wceq(cfv(c4, co(c2, caddc, c3)), co(cfv(c4, c2), cmul, cfv(c4, c3))))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(cfv(c4, co(c2, caddc, c3)), co(cfv(c4, c2), cmul, cfv(c4, c3)), cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3))), co(cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, c3))), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  eqtrd(cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3))), co(cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, c3))), cfv(ce, co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c0, cmul, c3))), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  fveq2d(ce, co(c0, cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c0, cmul, c3)), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  adddid(c0, c2, c3, w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wceq(cfv(ce, co(co(c0, cmul, c2), caddc, co(c0, cmul, c3))), co(cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, c3)))), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c2), cc), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c3), cc))
  mulcld(c0, c2, w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  sseldd(c2, cc, c1, w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  mulcld(c0, c3, w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  simp1l(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))
  sseldd(c3, cc, c1, w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  syl(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wss(c1, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld)))
  simp1r(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))
  subgss(c1, ccnfld, cc)
  cnfldbas()
  efadd(co(c0, cmul, c2), co(c0, cmul, c3))
  fvmptd3(hs0, c4, co(c2, caddc, c3), cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3))), c1, cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0))), universe, w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  fveq2d(ce, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), co(c0, cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(c2, caddc, c3)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), co(c2, caddc, c3), c0, cmul)
  3adant1l(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c3), c1))
  subgcl(c1, ccnfld, c2, c3, caddc)
  cnfldadd()
  fvexd(ce, co(c0, cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3)), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  oveq12d(cfv(c4, c2), cmul, cfv(c4, c3), cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, c3)), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  fvmptd3(hs0, c4, c2, cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, c2)), c1, cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0))), universe, w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  fveq2d(ce, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), co(c0, cmul, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c2, c0, cmul)
  simp2(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))
  fvexd(ce, co(c0, cmul, c2), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  fvmptd3(hs0, c4, c3, cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, c3)), c1, cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0))), universe, w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  eqtri(c4, cmpt(hs0, c1, cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)))), cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)))))
  cbvmptv(s0, hs0, c1, cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, cv(s0))), cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0))))
  fveq2d(ce, co(c0, cmul, cv(s0)), co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c0, cmul)
  fveq2d(ce, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)), co(c0, cmul, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c3, c0, cmul)
  simp3(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))
  fvexd(ce, co(c0, cmul, c3), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld))), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, caddc, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, co(c2, caddc, c3))))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ce, co(c0, cmul, cv(hs0)))
  diff.ce.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cmul, cv(hs0))
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, cv(s0))))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, c3)))
}

thm efgh(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld))∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1)→(c4 `(c2[+]c3))=((c4 ` c2)[×](c4 ` c3)))
  ⊣ c4 =(s0 ∈ c1 ↦(exp `(c0[×]s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  3eqtr4d((c4 `(c2[+]c3)), ((c4 ` c2)[×](c4 ` c3)), (exp `(c0[×](c2[+]c3))), ((exp `(c0[×]c2))[×](exp `(c0[×]c3))), ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld))∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1))
  eqtrd((exp `(c0[×](c2[+]c3))), ((exp `(c0[×]c2))[×](exp `(c0[×]c3))), (exp `((c0[×]c2)[+](c0[×]c3))), ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld))∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1))
  fveq2d(ce, (c0[×](c2[+]c3)), ((c0[×]c2)[+](c0[×]c3)), ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld))∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1))
  adddid(c0, c2, c3, ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld))∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1))
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld))∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1), (exp `((c0[×]c2)[+](c0[×]c3)))=((exp `(c0[×]c2))[×](exp `(c0[×]c3))), (c0[×]c2)∈ ℂ, (c0[×]c3)∈ ℂ)
  mulcld(c0, c2, ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld))∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1))
  sseldd(c2, cc, c1, ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld))∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1))
  mulcld(c0, c3, ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld))∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1))
  simp1l(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld), c2 ∈ c1, c3 ∈ c1)
  sseldd(c3, cc, c1, ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld))∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1))
  syl(((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld))∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1), c1 ⊆ ℂ, c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld))
  simp1r(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld), c2 ∈ c1, c3 ∈ c1)
  subgss(c1, ccnfld, cc)
  cnfldbas()
  efadd((c0[×]c2), (c0[×]c3))
  fvmptd3(hs0, c4, (c2[+]c3), (exp `(c0[×](c2[+]c3))), c1, (exp `(c0[×]hs0)), universe, ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld))∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1))
  fveq2d(ce, (c0[×]hs0), (c0[×](c2[+]c3)), hs0 =(c2[+]c3))
  oveq2(hs0, (c2[+]c3), c0, cmul)
  3adant1l(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld), c2 ∈ c1, c3 ∈ c1, (c2[+]c3)∈ c1)
  subgcl(c1, ccnfld, c2, c3, caddc)
  cnfldadd()
  fvexd(ce, (c0[×](c2[+]c3)), ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld))∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1))
  oveq12d((c4 ` c2), cmul, (c4 ` c3), (exp `(c0[×]c2)), (exp `(c0[×]c3)), ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld))∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1))
  fvmptd3(hs0, c4, c2, (exp `(c0[×]c2)), c1, (exp `(c0[×]hs0)), universe, ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld))∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1))
  fveq2d(ce, (c0[×]hs0), (c0[×]c2), hs0 = c2)
  oveq2(hs0, c2, c0, cmul)
  simp2((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld)), c2 ∈ c1, c3 ∈ c1)
  fvexd(ce, (c0[×]c2), ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld))∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1))
  fvmptd3(hs0, c4, c3, (exp `(c0[×]c3)), c1, (exp `(c0[×]hs0)), universe, ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld))∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1))
  eqtri(c4, (hs0 ∈ c1 ↦(exp `(c0[×]hs0))), (s0 ∈ c1 ↦(exp `(c0[×]s0))))
  cbvmptv(s0, hs0, c1, (exp `(c0[×]s0)), (exp `(c0[×]hs0)))
  fveq2d(ce, (c0[×]s0), (c0[×]hs0), s0 = hs0)
  oveq2(s0, hs0, c0, cmul)
  fveq2d(ce, (c0[×]hs0), (c0[×]c3), hs0 = c3)
  oveq2(hs0, c3, c0, cmul)
  simp3((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld)), c2 ∈ c1, c3 ∈ c1)
  fvexd(ce, (c0[×]c3), ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈(SubGrp ` CCfld))∧ c2 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 ∈ c1))
  diff.hs0.c((c2[+]c3))
  diff.hs0.c((exp `(c0[×](c2[+]c3))))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ce, (c0[×]hs0))
  diff.ce.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cmul, hs0)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c((exp `(c0[×]s0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((exp `(c0[×]c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c((exp `(c0[×]c3)))
}

thm efif1olem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s0), cmin, cv(s1))), clt, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c0, cioc, co(c0, caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))))
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s0), cmin, cv(s1))), clt, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s0), cmin, cv(s1))), clt, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  mpbir2and(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s0), cmin, cv(s1))), clt, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), wbr(co(cv(s1), cmin, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, co(cv(s1), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wbr(co(cv(s1), cmin, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), clt, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))))
  lelttrd(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(c0, caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))
  sylancl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cr))
  readdcl(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cpi))
  simp3d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, co(c0, caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s1)))
  ltadd1dd(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cv(s0), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))
  simp2d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))))
  ltsubaddd(cv(s1), co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cv(s0), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))
  lelttrd(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), co(c0, caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))
  sylancl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(co(cv(s1), caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cr), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cr))
  readdcl(cv(s1), co(nat2, cmul, cpi))
  simp3d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)))
  ltadd1dd(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cpi), cv(s1), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))
  simp2d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wbr(cv(s1), cle, co(c0, caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))))
  absdifltd(cv(s0), cv(s1), co(nat2, cmul, cpi), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))
  simp1d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)))), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cioc, co(c0, caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)))))
  syl6eleq(cv(s0), co(c0, cioc, co(c0, caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))
  simprl(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  syl2an2r(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wb(wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cioc, co(c0, caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)))), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, co(c0, caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))))), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(co(c0, caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cr))
  elioc2(c0, co(c0, caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)), cv(s0))
  simp1d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, co(c0, caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi))))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cr), wbr(c0, clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, co(c0, caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cioc, co(c0, caddc, co(nat2, cmul, cpi)))))

blocks.name: eff1olem
